txt.en: Scoutmaster Ausma has sent you a special crossbow to help you take down flying cold-drakes.\n\nYou should use the Drake-slayer crossbow to defeat flying cold-drakes.
The drake-slayer has lived up to its name!\n\nYou should talk to Hórin in Fellgát after the battle is over.

'[placeholder]! I'm glad I found you in time. The Scoutmaster sent me to deliver this: a special crossbow she has crafted that should be very effective against aerial drakes! You will need these as well.'

The scout hands you a bundle of black-metal bolts. They are covered in sharp barbs.

'It's called \qThe Drake-slayer!\q Make it live up to its name!'
A secret weapon to wield against the drakes has been brought to you!

'What have you there, [placeholder]? A crossbow?'

You hand Hórin the Drake-slayer and tell him the story of its making and of its success during the battle.

'Clever Ausma! Did she develop these black bolts herself as well? Hmm... Perhaps this is the key to defeating Hrímil once and for all...?'
